name: space spider
description:
INTRODUCTION

Space Spider is a fixed shooter game that pays homage to the classics 70s shooter game. Defend your last home in an inspiring battle against alien civilizations in a boundless universe. Face stronger enemies for stronger supplies and incentives.

GAME PLAY

At the beginning of the game, the enemies will appear directly above the map and keep approaching your spaceship.
You can stop them by moving your ship left and right and shooting down them with missiles.
Enemies will move left and right to avoid your attacks.
There will be some obstacles in the map, try to avoid them.
Destroy all enemies for final victory. don't worry, it's simple.

CONTROL

Arrow keys to control your spaceship.
Spacebar to launch missiles.
